law.catch_line: Action for declaration to be heard as motion.
law.text: Any action in which a declaration of rights or determination of questions of construction is the relief asked, may be docketed for early hearing as in the case of a motion.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 272. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 639a-3. -- Created 1922 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec 3.
